channel.title: Client only working for me please help!
channel.description: I downloaded the torvapkz source and client i am portforward got my ip and everything is on there and normal no errors all that for some reason i can get on the server but when others try and use my client and get on they get error connecting to server please help. also i belive i am useing the v2 source and the v1 client.

item.title: Client only working for me please help!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Could be the actual port 43594 is occupied, or you did not open the port correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: Client only working for me please help!
